amendment.description: To limit the application of the Davis-Bacon Act in the case of projects funded under this Act.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 19 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 42. Record Vote Number: 11.
Motion to table amendment SA 19 made in Senate.
Amendment SA 19 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S533-535; text: CR S533) To limit the application of the Davis-Bacon Act in the case of projects funded under this Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 19 proposed by Senator Paul.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 19 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 42. Record Vote Number: 11.
